data.name: METALLIC CHILD Chip Pack 1000
data.detailed_description:
An immediate addition of 1000 Chips!
Can be reused when starting a New Game!

What are Chips?

Currency used in the Core lab facilities to strengthen Rona; build Customs; recover Recor-Ds and Fan-art; among others.

Notes

1. This DLC can only be applied once, but will be automatically re-applied when a New Game is started.
2. Chips can also be obtained by defeating enemies in the battlefield.

data.short_description: Immediately obtain Chips that can be used to strengthen Rona; build Customs; recover Recor-Ds and Fan-art; etc.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows®10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3330 / AMD Ryzen™ 3100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 / AMD Radeon™ R7260X
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows®10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen™ 3100
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / AMD Radeon™ R7370
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
